page.title: 16Development
page.content: Further housing development in the area is causing concern among existing residents over the erosion of green belt land.A proposed new development of 750 houses on land adjoining residential areas has provoked petitions and objections from locals that too many houses are scheduled to be built. Resident association meetings have been held and action groups formed to combat the building.The most recent development is that the Local planning authority have agreed in principle to limit the number of dwellings to 500. Action is to be continued to further object and attempt to prevent any further building at all.
